_sText:
Watch more CS Source Videos
There are a lot of changes and additions in this version from v1 changes / additions: - randomly timed doors (open /close randomly) - useable spotlight - new glass texture - breakable glass - props in the spawns - some texture changes - "secret" doorway in the "red rooms" - brighter lights - more spawn points - changed the middle rooms props around i think thats about it but it is a pretty fun map if you have any problems with it let me know otherwise enjoy :) thanks to Z for his glass texture and making the random doors thanks to Jonny Higgins for his spotlight prefab thanks to Chizbone for his naving expertise there will be an update to the file with a custom nav file made by Chizbone
